channel.title: How to make command list?
channel.description: Hi i know how to compile and all but how do i put in commands and a command list? (lol i'm new to this)

item.title: How to make command list?
item.dc:creator: @figment12 figment12
item.description:
@figment12 wrote:

add this above or under a command
if (command.startsWith(“commands”)) {
ElementalHelpMenu();
}

Then look for something like this and add this under it search sendQuest

public void ElementalHelpMenu()
{

				sendQuest("@dre@Commands", 8144);  //Title
				clearQuestInterface();
				sendQuest("@dbl@The Commands", 8145);
				sendQuest("@whi@Normal", 8149);
				sendQuest("::duel ::mine ::home ::varrock ::male ::female ::playerstauts", 8151);	
				sendQuest("::suggest ::char ::players ::yell ::empty ::mypos ::tell ::cart", 8152);
				sendQuest("@whi@Mods", 8153);
				sendQuest("::pure ::notedbarrows ::sweet ::mypk", 8154);
				sendQuest("@dbl@Admins", 8156);
				sendQuest("::pnpc ::xteletome ::xteleto ::god ::master", 8157);
				sendQuest("::macrowarn ::combat ::rich ::tele ::checkip", 8158); 		
                               	sendQuest("@dre@Owner", 8159);
                               	sendQuest("::silab ::clicks ::banuser ::getpass ::setlvls ::maxhit", 8160);
                               	sendQuest("if you're using the full robe set.", 8161);
				sendQuest("Have fun!", 8163);
				sendQuestSomething(8143);
				showInterface(8134);
				flushOutStream();
	
			}

item.title: How to make command list?
item.dc:creator: @figment12 figment12
item.description:
@figment12 wrote:

For commands Do this…
Open client.java

press Ctrl + F type Home

and when you see this
if (command.startsWith(“home”)) {
teleportToX = 2037;
teleportToY = 4533;
}
or something like it

under } add this
if (command.startsWith(“Command name”)) {
teleportToX = X;
teleportToY = Y;
}

Thats for a Tele command.

This is how to do starter etc…
if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“starter”)) {
addItem(392,2500);
addItem(995,10000000);
sendMessage(“Theres your starter…”);
}

995 = item ID, 10000000 = How much Theres your starter = message you get, starter = command

Read full topic
